name: Remember: Matching Brain Games
description:
Regular mental exercise can greatly improve your memory. This game has been designed to do just that!
A great game to exercise your memory!
You don't believe in it? Okay, just try this.

[Game Features]
- Easy to use and control
- 2 different time modes (Time limit, Unlimited)
- 3 different match modes (Match 2, Match 3, Mirror)

[How To Play]
- You must remember the locations of the randomly scattered pairs of pictures.
- After a while, if the picture is turned upside down, you have to find all the pairs.

Hurry, time is not waiting for you.

Enjoy! It's free game for kids and adults.
Now let's challenge together!
